alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 1:51PM CST until January 25 at 11:53AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Spring Creek near Hegar Road affecting Harris County. For the Spring Creek...including Hegar Road...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring Creek near Hegar Road. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:35 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 210.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 214.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 214.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 800 AM CST.
